title: Regenerativa Holon Schema
description: A schema for holons participating in the Regenerativa network - a system aligned with lunar cycles and regenerative principles

linked_schemas.title: Linked Schemas
linked_schemas.description: A list of schemas this profile validates against

description.title: Description
description.description: A description of this holon's purpose and activities

geolocation.title: Geolocation
geolocation.description: The geographic location of this holon

lunar_alignment.title: Lunar Alignment
lunar_alignment.description: Which lunar phase this holon aligns its work cycles with
enumNames: New Moon - Begin cycles at new moon
Full Moon - Begin cycles at full moon

regenerative_impact.title: Regenerative Impact
regenerative_impact.description: Measurable regenerative contributions of this holon

trees_planted.title: Trees Planted
trees_planted.description: Total number of trees planted and maintained

land_regenerated_hectares.title: Land Regenerated (hectares)
land_regenerated_hectares.description: Hectares of land actively being regenerated

wildlife_corridors_m.title: Wildlife Corridors (meters)
wildlife_corridors_m.description: Length of wildlife corridors created/maintained in meters

plastic_removed_kg.title: Plastic Removed (kg)
plastic_removed_kg.description: Kilograms of plastic removed from environment

resource_needs.title: Resource Needs (Inputs)
resource_needs.description: Resources this holon needs to fulfill its purpose

optionality_score.title: Optionality Score
optionality_score.description: How many other resources can be obtained through this (1-100)

subscribers.title: Subscribers
subscribers.description: Number of people who have subscribed to this need (Theos-style)

resource_outputs.title: Resource Outputs (Positive Externalities)
resource_outputs.description: Resources and services this holon provides to the network

description.title: Description
description.description: Specific description of what is offered

capacity.title: Capacity
capacity.description: How much can be provided (with units)

access_pathways.title: Access Pathways
access_pathways.description: How others can access this output

flow_token_balance.title: Flow Token Balance
flow_token_balance.description: Current balance of Flow tokens earned through contributions

contribution_history.title: Contribution History
contribution_history.description: Recent contributions recognized by the network

lunar_cycle.title: Lunar Cycle
lunar_cycle.description: Which lunar cycle this occurred in (e.g., 'New Moon Jan 2025')

negative_externalities.title: Negative Externalities
negative_externalities.description: Resources consumed and impacts generated (which become needs for other holons to address)

mitigation_efforts.title: Mitigation Efforts
mitigation_efforts.description: What is being done to address this

seasonal_gatherings.title: Seasonal Gathering Participation
seasonal_gatherings.description: Which quarterly gatherings this holon participates in

bootstrap_network.title: Bootstrap Network Support
bootstrap_network.description: Is this holon available to support those transitioning from conventional systems?

journeyman_hosting.title: Journeyman Hosting
journeyman_hosting.description: Can this holon host traveling skilled workers/developers?

schema.name: regenerativa_holon-v0.1.0
schema.purpose: To map holons participating in the Regenerativa network with lunar alignment, resource flows, and regenerative impact tracking
